title: iduvE nam mathamE
sahitya:
iduvE nam mathamE iraivan sammatamE


anupallavi

  adu nIyEnum vEdam anbE adan bOdham manamE


caraNam    idayamtOrum ilagum onrai inidu kalandu vAzhvOm
innuyirp-paNigaLAlE Ishanai vazhipaDuvOm
udaya jnAyirena viLangi Om aruviyaip-pOl vazhangi
uLLam Ongi uNmai Ongi ulagak-kOvil ilaga vAzhvOm
